page.title: 19SWINDERBY,A 13 YEAR OLDS DAY
page.content: In the {school holidays}I wake up at 7am but,I read a book until 8.30. Then I make my way to the kitchen, boil an egg for{breakfast}and I clean my teeth with ultra-bright toothpaste.At 9.00 I watch T.V. then I get dressed. I call for my friend and we cycle to the play area to make dens out of straw. I go home at 12.00 to have my{dinner which is usually something on toast. After dinner I go back to the playarea to have a game of scat(hide and seek). I usually have a cold meal for{tea and after eating it I wash up. I watch {television}until 10.00 when I go to bed in my night-shirt under my duvet. On{school days}I get up at 7.00 and go for the school bus at 8am.We get to school at 8.30.Assemblies are at 8.50. Lessons begin at 9.25.At 12.00 I eat a packed lunch. Lessons are from 1.10 until 3.45. I have 2 hours{homework.
